post.author: 이성기
post.content:
Hi ,
Trust all is well with you. My apologies for not personalizing this email as I am sending this email to thousands of people in my network and I thank you for any assistance you can give me. Please see below the details on the role that I am currently pursuing for my client. This opportunity is in Vancouver, I was hoping to network with you to see if there is anyone you would know.
User Experience Developer - Web Producer - 3 month Contract - Vancouver - (Skills) - Minimum 5+ years user experience web developer/design. Must have worked closely with users and visual designers to develop user friendly (ie functional, fast and intuitive) sites for clients whether they are intranet or extranet sites Must have portal experience, HTML, CSS, Flash, ASP.net, and sharepoint. Silverlight (microsoft base) an asset. Good oral and written skills. Many years of client facing is a must.
If you or anyone you know who would be interested, please contact me immediately.
Regards, Ed Rix Resource Planning Watercrest "Bridging People with Technology" (888) 244-7550 ext.110 ed@watercrest.net
post.title: 또. 아 닷넷... 아깝다...
